text: Carlos Chacón Galindo (12 December 1934 – 17 February 2021) was a Peruvian politician. He was Provincial Mayor for Cusco Province from 1967 to 1969 and again from 1987 to 1989. He was born in Cusco, Peru. Chacón Galindo died on 17 February 2021 in Lima at the age of 86.Condolencias por el fallecimiento del Sr. Carlos Chacón Galindo» == References == Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Peruvian mayors
title: Carlos Chacón Galindo
